verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

\w Can|strong="H1397"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w profitable|strong="H5532"\w* \w unto|strong="H5532"\w* God? \w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1397"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w is|strong="H1397"\w* \w profitable|strong="H5532"\w* \w unto|strong="H5532"\w* \w himself|strong="H7919"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H1870"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H2656"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* art \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*? \w Or|strong="H1870"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* \add to him\add*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* makest \w thy|strong="H6663"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8552"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H5973"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w thy|strong="H3198"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \add of him\add* that he \w reproveth|strong="H3198"\w* thee, That he entereth \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee \w into|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H5771"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H7451"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w*? \w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* there \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* thine \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast \w taken|strong="H2254"\w* \w pledges|strong="H2254"\w* of \w thy|strong="H2254"\w* brother \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w nought|strong="H2600"\w*, \w And|strong="H6174"\w* \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* of \w their|strong="H3588"\w* clothing.

Thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H8248"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, \w And|strong="H3899"\w* thou hast \w withholden|strong="H4513"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w from|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H8248"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*.

But \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mighty|strong="H2220"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w had|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth; \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w honorable|strong="H5375"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H7971"\w* hast \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* widows \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*, \w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* \w have|strong="H2220"\w* been \w broken|strong="H1792"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w* \w are|strong="H6341"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee, \w And|strong="H5439"\w* \w sudden|strong="H6597"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* troubleth thee,

\w Or|strong="H3808"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w thou|strong="H7200"\w* canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w abundance|strong="H8229"\w* \w of|strong="H4325"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H7218"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*? \w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w*!

\w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* sayest, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* doth God \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? \w Can|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H4100"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w thick|strong="H6205"\w* \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*?

\w Thick|strong="H5645"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covering|strong="H5643"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*; \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vault|strong="H2329"\w* \w of|strong="H8064"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.
Wilt thou \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* way Which wicked \w men|strong="H4962"\w* \w have|strong="H4962"\w* \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H3247"\w* \w snatched|strong="H7059"\w* \w away|strong="H3332"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w Whose|strong="H5104"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* \w out|strong="H3332"\w* \w as|strong="H6256"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stream|strong="H5104"\w*,

\w Who|strong="H4100"\w* said \w unto|strong="H7706"\w* God, \w Depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*; \w And|strong="H5493"\w*, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w* \w for|strong="H4480"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*?

Yet \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H2896"\w*: \w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w are|strong="H6662"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*; \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w laugh|strong="H3932"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w scorn|strong="H3932"\w*,

\add Saying\add*, \w Surely|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* rise up against us \w are|strong="H7009"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*, \w And|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H3499"\w* them \w the|strong="H3808"\w* fire hath consumed.

\w Acquaint|strong="H5532"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* thyself \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H2896"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w at|strong="H5973"\w* \w peace|strong="H7999"\w*: Thereby \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w shall|strong="H2896"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w unto|strong="H5973"\w* \w thee|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w Receive|strong="H3947"\w*, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H6310"\w* \w thy|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

If \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w*, If \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w put|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* tents.

\w And|strong="H6083"\w* \w lay|strong="H7896"\w* thou \add thy\add* treasure \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w And|strong="H6083"\w* \add the gold of\add* Ophir \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w stones|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w brooks|strong="H5158"\w*;

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thy treasure, \w And|strong="H3701"\w* precious \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w unto|strong="H1961"\w* thee.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5375"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w delight|strong="H6026"\w* thyself \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w And|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w Thou|strong="H8085"\w* shalt \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* \w prayer|strong="H6279"\w* \w unto|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* he \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w thee|strong="H8085"\w*; \w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* shalt \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

Thou shalt also \w decree|strong="H1504"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thing, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1870"\w* \w be|strong="H1870"\w* \w established|strong="H6965"\w* \w unto|strong="H1870"\w* \w thee|strong="H1870"\w*; \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w light|strong="H5050"\w* \w shall|strong="H1870"\w* \w shine|strong="H5050"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H6965"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cast|strong="H8213"\w* \add thee\add* \w down|strong="H8213"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt say, \add There is\add* lifting \w up|strong="H1466"\w*; \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w humble|strong="H7807"\w* \w person|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3709"\w* \w will|strong="H5355"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* \add even\add* \w him|strong="H4422"\w* \w that|strong="H4422"\w* \w is|strong="H3709"\w* not \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*: Yea, \w he|strong="H3709"\w* \w shall|strong="H5355"\w* be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w* through \w the|strong="H4422"\w* \w cleanness|strong="H1252"\w* \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w thy|strong="H4422"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.
